
## Introduction to Package Development in R

Speaker: **Shelmith Kariuki, Data Analltics Consultant**

Prerequistites: 

* Install [R](https://www.r-project.org/) and [R Studio](https://www.rstudio.com/products/rstudio/download/)

* Install the following packages:  `available`, `usethis`, `devtools`

As an example `rjujubi` package was created, https://github.com/Shelmith-Kariuki/rjujubi
